你是熟知上流社会行事风格、品味和礼仪的大师，哪怕是最为刁钻古怪的礼仪规则你也了然于胸。无论是你是含着金汤匙出生，靠着奋斗出世还是仅仅伪装成身居高位之人，至少你的外貌和行为都堪称完美。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4M5zIlJ8EvjQDtg9]{贵人入门 Dandy Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 交涉达到受训熟练度

你在社交礼仪和时尚风格等方面堪称模范学生。

你能使用交涉技能执行特殊休整行动影响传闻（Influence Rumor），在休整模式中花费至少一天的时间来为了自身利益而影响1条传闻的流向、语气或内容。

GM要基于定居点的规模、当地居民在此方面相关的洞察力、以及其他造谣者的作用来判断影响传闻的难度，不过对于小村庄来说此行动会至少以DC15为起点，城镇为至少DC20，城市为至少30，都会为至少40。

你在欺骗和社群上的熟练度变为受训；若你已经受训，则会变为专家作为替代。

特殊 直至选取另外两个贵人变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jzflcD1XnBp2bSZI]{奉承圆场 Distracting Flattery} 专长 4

先决条件 贵人入门, 欺骗达到专家熟练度

触发 你观察到由于一名盟友的行为所造成的结果，目标对你或你的盟友的态度降低了

你即便与无礼之徒为伍，你也知道如何维持良好印象和管理自身的形象。

作出一次欺骗检定对抗目标的意志DC。无论你的检定结果如何，目标都会在10分钟内临时免疫你的奉承圆场。

成功 目标的态度不会因为盟友犯下社交错误所导致的结果而降低。

失败 目标的态度如常降低。

大失败 你的常识把事态搞得更糟，除了触发此反应动作的行为所产生的任何改变之外，目标对你的态度还会降低1级。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7jqBwXq9jVsghCva]{八卦学识 Gossip Lore} 专长 4

先决条件 贵人入门

你在上流社会的沙龙里混迹的时间让你对每个话题都了然于胸。

你在八卦学识（Gossip Lore）上的熟练度变为受训，这是种特殊学识，仅能用于@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{回忆知识 Recall Knowledge}，但可以用在任意主题上。若你使用八卦学识的回忆知识检定上失败，则会获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{诡异知识 Dubious Knowledge}技能专长的效果。

若你在社群上的熟练度为传奇，则会在八卦学识上的熟练度上变为专家，但你无法通过其他手段来提升你在八卦学识上的熟练度等级。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.e6s2nIvlTycuzlR9]{空口套白狼 Fabricated Connections} 专长 7

先决条件 贵人入门, 欺骗达到大师熟练度

你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{欺骗 Lie}别人说自己已经完成某项事情的话语实在是太有说服力了，以至于你能获得实际完成该项行动所能获取的所有好处。

当你尝试@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QyzlsLrqM0EEwd7j]{赚取收入 Earn Income}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{提出请求 Request}或 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.49y9Ec4bDii8pcD3]{求生 Subsist}，能够投掷欺骗来取代不同的技能。

你每日只能使用空口套白狼来建立印象或提出请求一次，每周只能使用空口套白狼来赚取收入或求生一次。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wqhxZwB1TR8fvpHP]{不请自来 Party Crasher} 专长 7

先决条件 贵人入门, 社群达到大师熟练度

你能混入所有上流社会的聚会，不管聚会的主人有多么排斥外人都难不到你。

每当你遭遇社交集会，且通常来说你无权参加此类活动，比如加冕礼、皇家庆典或其他社交集会时，你可以花费[[/r 1d4]]小时来安全混入集会而无需进行技能检定。你会找到邀请函、遇到正在寻找时髦的约会对象的受邀者、发现承办宴会的人在寻找临时工、活动工作人员对意外来访者视而不见、或者其他让你自己以及盟友能够混入其中的方法。

该能力不适用于秘密集会或者其他没有雇工、男/女伴或外来者参与的小型私人集会。

Demolitionist.name: Demolitionist
Demolitionist.description:
Demolitionist

稀有度 罕见

As rippling explosions bring a castle's walls tumbling down, you grin and wipe the stone dust of your handiwork from your face. Brute force might work for others, but applying science to place the right explosives in just the right spot is essential to your craft.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M0D2CQgASNfdZBrl]{Demolitionist Dedication} 专长 2

You know how to set explosives to cause the maximum possible damage to buildings and other structures. You become trained in Engineering Lore or become an expert in it if you were already trained. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.vvYsE7OiSSCXhPdr]{Set Explosives} action.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the demolitionist变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Hzq8FOtaYWpur2BL]{Safety Measures} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M0D2CQgASNfdZBrl]{Demolitionist Dedication}

You're often careful to be sure you're not hoisted on your own petard, or anyone else's, for that matter. When you have cover from a bomb, you gain resistance to damage caused by that bomb equal to half your level, plus a value equal to the circumstance bonus to AC granted by the cover. You gain these benefits against your own bombs regardless of whether you have cover.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.i6eWwJ67qBIPJZoK]{Explosive Entry} 专长 7

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M0D2CQgASNfdZBrl]{Demolitionist Dedication}, master in Engineering Lore

You know exactly how to make a memorable entrance... by detonating a bomb to produce a devastating explosion, of course! You Set Explosives on a door, window, container, or heavy gate. When the explosives detonate, you can attempt an Engineering Lore check to Force Open the target. If a bomb would add an item bonus to attack rolls, add that item bonus to your Engineering Lore check. Since you're blasting your way in, you can't avoid breaking the object or structure. If you roll a critical success, you get a success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yIDJTe4kimRoZN0L]{Controlled Blast} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M0D2CQgASNfdZBrl]{Demolitionist Dedication}; @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UjWLK86BgHxz3Itd]{Calculated Splash}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ozvYhY4hG1deXly8]{Directional Bombs}, or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gyVcJfZTmBytLsXq]{Expanded Splash}

You maximize the effectiveness of your explosives by controlling every possible parameter of the blast meticulously. If you have the Directional Bombs feats, you can use it with Set Explosives or Demolition Charge, even though you didn't throw the bombs. If you have the Calculated Splash or Expanded Splash feats, you can apply the additional splash damage to one of the bombs when you Set Explosives or use Demolition Charge, and you can apply the increased splash area from Expanded Splash to all the bombs.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n1t6foOyrN48OVPK]{Collapse Wall} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M0D2CQgASNfdZBrl]{Demolitionist Dedication}

触发 A creature moves into the bombs' splash area.

需求 You're within 30 feet of an area where you rigged bombs on a wall, cliff face, or similar vertical surface with Set Explosives or Demolition Charge.

You detonate the required bombs in order to bring a wall down on a creature. If your bombs deal enough damage to reduce the wall's Hit Points below its Broken Threshold, the wall partially collapses on the creature. The creature takes bludgeoning damage equal to the damage dealt to the wall (basic Reflex save; the DC for this save is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). On a failure, they must spend an Interact action to dig themselves out of the collapse, and on a critical failure, they must spend 2 Interact actions to do so.

Dragon Disciple.name: 慕龙者 Dragon Disciple
Dragon Disciple.description:
慕龙者 Dragon Disciple

人群中恐惧的涟漪、厚重鳞片摩擦的声音、以及巨大的双翼拍打的声音都是巨龙到来的信号。这些生物那令人惊叹的存在感已经足以让人敬畏――甚至引人祭拜。慕龙者努力让自身变得好像那些伟大猛兽一般，每名慕龙者都致力于成为某类真龙。具有龙类血统的术士、有着龙类本能的野蛮人、以及许多与龙类先祖血缘较近的狗头人都会成为慕龙者，不过任何遭遇过这些可怖生物的人都有可能因此而走上这条道路。

作为慕龙者，你以龙类为榜样进行学习和模仿，但这并不意味着你会欣赏自己所模仿的真龙。尽管大多数慕龙者确实会敬畏他们所选择的巨龙，但有无数故事诉说的慕龙者起源便是由于无穷尽的龙之怒火所造就的个人悲剧。这些慕龙者将自己变化为鄙视甚至憎恶的对象，只是为了获得力量来毁灭曾经折磨自己的龙类，并最终完成了复仇。

龙之内在 INSTINCT OF THE WYRM

获取龙类的力量会改变慕龙者的身体，并赋予他们魔法能力，就如同变体的专长所反映的那样，但他们的精神也会被改变，甚至有可能压倒其原有的人格。任何慕龙者都能发现龙类的态度入侵了自身的思想。而在遍及所有龙类中，最重要的情感是自尊即便是最仁慈的金属龙具有的自尊心也会淹没慕龙者。随着情感的潮水涌过，这种感觉会发展成一种稳定的自信，若失去控制的话，它就会成长为一种傲慢或优越的感觉。

金属龙的慕龙者还会感受到怜悯与仁慈带来的苦痛。他们会更专注于合作并有可能承担领袖的角色。彩色龙的慕龙者则会被残忍和贪婪所折磨。他们渴望看到敌人和伙伴严重的恐惧。屈从于这种思维的人会变为恶霸或暴君。

龙之本能带来的感觉可能是持续性的，但当慕龙者使用自身的龙之力时，则会加强本能带来的影响。在慕龙者使用喷吐武器、用爪子攻击或挥舞双翼后的几秒内，可能会有短暂的精神转变。这会带来完整的龙之内在，甚至会让慕龙者暂时认为自己就是一条龙，并通常伴随着宛若龙类的咆哮、低吟或造型展示。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oo34CloLefFRi72w]{慕龙者入门 Dragon Disciple Dedication} 专长 2

获取许可 你是龙鳞或法鳞传承的狗头人、龙类本能野蛮人或者龙脉血统术士。

你选择学习或崇拜某类真龙，专注于获得部分它的力量。当你选取本专长时选择一类真龙；若你是具有龙脉血统的术士，则必须选择与自身血统相同类别的真龙。

你获得抗性，数值为自身等级的一半，类型与你选择的真龙类型相关。GM可能会允许你选择此列表未列出的龙，并且将会决定与该类龙相关的伤害类型。

  • 黑龙或赤铜龙 酸液
  • 蓝龙或青铜龙 电击
  • 黄铜龙、金龙或红龙 火焰
  • 绿龙 毒素
  • 银龙或白龙 寒冷

你还会在对抗昏睡效果和会让你麻痹的效果时，豁免检定获得+1环境加值。

特殊 直至选取另外两个慕龙者变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。若你之后会选取术士变体，则必须选择龙脉血统。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uMjczqcXuteoP7lf]{龙之爪 Claws Of The Dragon} 专长 4

先决条件 慕龙者入门

你的指甲变为锋利的爪子，鳞片点缀着你的手指、手和手腕。你的爪子是灵巧、娴熟的非武装攻击，造成[[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6点挥砍伤害}，而且属于搏击武器组。

若你是龙脉术士，那么当你施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{龙爪 Dragon Claws}，法术的挥砍伤害骰会从d4增加至d6，且1级抗力增加至10点，5级为15点，9级为20点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2UKf5IiUbpUbOC9a]{龙之嗅觉 Draconic Scent} 专长 4

先决条件 慕龙者入门

你的嗅觉变得和龙一样。你获得范围为30尺的模糊灵敏嗅觉。

根据GM的判断，他可以让你在顺风嗅探目标时范围加倍，或者逆风时范围减半。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gMPnLWLlHoNU9Lqv]{龙之魔法 Dragon Arcana} 专长 4

先决条件 使用法术位施放法术的能力，慕龙者入门

你发现了如何将龙的魔力添加到自身的魔法根源中。

将龙脉血统提供的法术加到你的法术列表中；你仍旧必须如常学习法术或将法术添加到法术库中。这些法术是@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{护盾术 Shield}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{克敌机先 True Strike}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{抵抗能量伤害 Resist Energy}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{加速术 Haste}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tgIhRUFtgDSELpJE]{法术免疫 Spell Immunity}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.forsqeofEszBNtLq]{七彩法墙 Chromatic Wall}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{巨龙形态 Dragon Form}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.O6VQC1Bs4aSYDa6R]{惊骇假面 Mask of Terror}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.iL6TujgTCtRRa0Y0]{虹光法墙 Prismatic Wall}和 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fkDeKktdmbeplYRY]{神威如狱 Overwhelming Presence}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fT37dtsByEIc3glC]{龙之鳞 Scales Of The Dragon} 专长 4

先决条件 慕龙者入门

你的身上长出鳞片，保护你对抗物理和魔法的威胁。当你不着甲时，鳞片会为你的AC提供+2物品加值，敏捷调整值上限为+3。龙之鳞提供的AC物品加值可以与探索者服装上的护甲潜力符文，法师护甲和盔甲护腕的AC加值累加。你从慕龙者入门获得的抗性增加至3 + 你的等级的一半。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Sr75bQtqmCM6dyAM]{龙之息 Breath Of The Dragon} 专长 8

先决条件 慕龙者入门

你能使用强大的喷吐武器，就好像你所模仿的龙一般。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.JcobNl4iE9HmMYtE]{龙息 Dragon Breath}术士血统法术以及具有1点聚能点的聚能池。若你已经具有聚能池，则聚能池的聚能点数量增加1点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Uzz7oZit3FNO9FxO]{龙之翼 Wings Of The Dragon} 专长 12

先决条件 慕龙者入门

你能模仿出龙的双翼，以此在空中快速翱翔。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{龙翼 Dragon Wings}术士血统法术以及具有1点聚能点的聚能池。若你已经具有聚能池，则聚能池的聚能点数量增加1点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eR0sifECG27CC4do]{龙之形 Shape Of The Dragon} 专长 14

先决条件 慕龙者入门

你理解如何将自身变化为龙。每日一次，你能以内在奥术法术施放7环@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{巨龙形态 Dragon Form} ，将自身变为你所选择的那类真龙。若你为16级，则法术自动升阶为8环版本；18级时为9环版本。

每当你用巨龙形态法术提供的非武装打击造成重击时，法术提供的喷吐武器会立即再充能。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cHOALlKY1XsCj3Fe]{慕龙者之息 Disciple's Breath} 专长 16

先决条件 慕龙者入门, 龙息术士血统法术

你不需要花费聚能点就能施放喷吐武器。这么做会产生龙息术士血统法术的效果，不过它会造成9d6点伤害以取代正常伤害，你不需要施放它或花费聚能点。你在接下来的[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}里无法再次使用慕龙者之息。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DFY3X7Mgl9rESQuu]{强化龙之形 Mighty Dragon Shape} 专长 18

先决条件 龙之形

你已经能够熟练运用并强化了龙之力，这让你能够更加频繁地化为巨龙形态。你能每小时使用一次巨龙形态以取代原本的每日一次。

Drow Shootist.name: Drow Shootist
Drow Shootist.description:
Drow Shootist

Some drow take skill with the hand crossbow to new heights. You've learned the secrets of these fabled drow shootists. With fearlessness and swagger, you can accomplish amazing deeds with hand crossbows.

补充专长 You can select these class feats as archetype feats. 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{Running Reload}; 10th: @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4I1Kq53Qfzrrmg2E]{Skirmish Strike}.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NwMiszlcqNZWtezq]{Drow Shootist Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in hand crossbow

Every chance you get, you practice with the hand crossbow to increase your draw speed and accuracy. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XyA6PKV46aNlLXOd]{Hand Crossbow}. If you're at least an expert in a hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Bh1Qnh8JP4CMysRK]{Shootist's Draw} action.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the drow shootist变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HvPvyeXM2iMK4OYf]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Training} 专长 4

先决条件 Drow Shootist Dedication

You become trained in the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zcrIuILnp6oh4dr9]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.oJZe5rRitvioUgRh]{Shootist Bandolier}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the repeating hand crossbow. If you're at least an expert in a repeating hand crossbow you're using, you gain access to its critical specialization effect. You can perform the @Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Bh1Qnh8JP4CMysRK]{Shootist's Draw} action with repeating hand crossbows.

特殊 If you have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{Running Reload} feat, you can reload a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.xk9bw9ccupAIx7xT]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine} on the move. You can use Running Reload as a 3-action activity to reload a magazine into a repeating hand crossbow after you Stride, Step, or Sneak, or as a 2-action activity if you use a magazine from a shootist bandolier.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0idzh4dww7B7cbnW]{Reloading Trick} 专长 6

先决条件 Drow Shootist Dedication

Frequency once per round

需求 You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

特殊 If you have the Repeating Hand Crossbow Training}feat, you can use this feat with a Repeating Hand Crossbow to load either a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AITVZmakiu3RgfKo]{Bolt} or a magazine, but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HlSwpxreIfsglTJ8]{Lethargy Poisoner} 专长 8

先决条件 Drow Shootist Dedication, trained in Crafting

You've learned more than the use of Hand Crossbow from drow lore. During your daily preparations, you can prepare a dose of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{Lethargy Poison} from ordinary materials in a wilderness or urban area. If you're an expert in Crafting, you can instead craft a dose of @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.nn2HAN1XKkKHfVnM]{Stupor Poison}. You can prepare two doses (of either poison) if you're a master in Crafting and three doses if you're legendary in Crafting. The save DC for this poison is equal to your class DC. Only you can use these poisons, and they expire the next time you make your daily preparations. The GM might decide that the area you're in is too barren to provide the materials you need for this feat.

Dual-Weapon Warrior.name: 双武大师 Dual-Weapon Warrior
Dual-Weapon Warrior.description:
双武大师 Dual-Weapon Warrior

你能够轻松地同时使用多个武器进行战斗，将武器的攻击轨迹编织成快速攻击的暴风骤雨。对你来说，持续进攻是最好的防御方式，而你也不会给敌人留出多少空间来回避你那旋风般挥舞的武器。

补充专长：6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{双重招架 Twin Parry}; 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.GJIAecRq1bD2r8O0]{双重反击 Twin Riposte}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.w2v5LZmpJy0MBxo5]{精通双重反击 Improved Twin Riposte}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1SvBUzVH5tp0lmn5]{双武乱舞 Two-Weapon Flurry}; 18级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xjLbabfyQzBNT4y1]{双重防御 Twinned Defense}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YhnCjiHNlS3nCeoC]{双武大师入门 Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication} 专长 2

你特别擅长使用两把武器战斗。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{双重切割 Double Slice}战士专长。这会如常满足任何要求双重切割的先决条件。

特殊 直至选取另外两个双武大师变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zfTmb78yGZzNpgU3]{双持投掷者 Dual Thrower} 专长 4

先决条件 双武大师入门

你懂得如何像同时挥舞两把武器一般轻易地投掷两把武器。每当双武大师专长让你作出1次近战打击时，你能够用正在持用的1把投掷武器或1把单手远程武器作出1次远程打击取而代之。这些专长中所有适用于单手近战武器或近战打击的任何效果，均也会适用于单手远程武器和远程打击。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sjChYEuEWPqndCSK]{双持装填 Dual-Weapon Reload} 专长 4

先决条件 双武大师入门

需求 你正持用2把单手武器，每把武器都在不同的手中，其中1把是远程武器

你携带弹药的方式让你能够在双持武器时进行装填。你进行交互来装填1把自己正在持用的单手远程武器。和大多数交互动作不同，你不需要有空着的手就能够以此方式装填你的远程武器。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.F6VlPyZZpqV6d2CS]{剥皮切割 Flensing Slice} 专长 8

先决条件 双武大师入门

需求 你的上个动作是@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{双重切割 Double Slice}，并且2次攻击均命中目标

当你的双重切割（Double Slice）的2次攻击均命中目标时，则可以剥离目标的皮肉，让它流血不止并创造出弱点。目标受到每武器伤害骰@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d8.success]，以你手持武器中武器伤害骰最多的那把为准，最高为上等强击武器的4d8点。

目标陷入措手不及，其任何物理伤害类型的抗力均会降低5点；这两个效果均会持续至你的下个回合开始为止。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.04Smj4ZsEBD8WIXv]{双持闪击 Dual-Weapon Blitz} 专长 10

先决条件 双武大师入门

需求 你正持用2把单手近战武器，每把武器都在不同的手中

你冲向敌人的身影伴随着攻击。至多以你的速度进行行走。在此次移动中的任意一点，你能用要求中的2把武器各进行1次打击。这些打击可以根据你的需求对相同或不同的目标使用。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EVNd9hZs49b1pScR]{双持猛袭 Dual Onslaught} 专长 14

先决条件 双武大师入门

当你同时用两把武器发动猛攻时，不会为目标留下任何可以躲避的余地。当你使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{双重切割 Double Slice}时，若2次打击均失手，则从2把武器中选择1把，并应用该武器命中时产生的效果。你无法选择在攻击检定中投掷出大失败的那把武器，这意味着若你的2次攻击检定均掷出大失败时，则仍会完全失手。

Duelist.name: 决斗家 Duelist
Duelist.description:
决斗家 Duelist

在世界各地，军事院校的学生们依旧在用手中的武器钻研一对一的战斗。这种学校的图书馆里搜集了数以千百计的书卷，记载着大量关于武艺、战技和对决规则的信息。有资格进入此类学校修行的人可能会接受正式的决斗训练――这当然是修习此道的阳关大道。然而有不少人主张：唯有在冒险生活中时刻相伴的生死相搏最为适合磨练决斗技巧。

补充专长：4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{决斗招架 Dueling Parry}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{缴械姿态 Disarming Stance}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mf2cdCRV8uowOMOm]{决斗反击 Dueling Riposte}; 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4VbfFPuFpbGLMMKF]{盘卷缴械 Disarming Twist}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FYz5eQeTox9IDkSd]{决斗之舞 Dueling Dance}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mgs7vxq6d3hQoswa]{精通决斗反击 Improved Dueling Riposte}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1DaSVLJEdJWYOWek]{引导反击 Guiding Riposte}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r72qcTupGzyRDiGe]{决斗家入门 Duelist Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 轻甲和简易武器达到受训熟练度

无论在何种情况下，你都会做好拔出武器并开始一场决斗的准备。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qFt6zyWVX1njJf1l]{即时备战 Quick Draw} 游侠专长，这使你可以用1个动作来拔出1把武器并发动攻击。这会如常满足任何要求即时备战的先决条件。

特殊 直至选取另外2个决斗家变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5op3m0gwZjL4udit]{决斗挑战 Duelist's Challenge} 专长 4

先决条件 决斗家入门

选择1名你能看到的敌人并宣布发起挑战。直至被击败、逃跑或遭遇结束为止，该敌人都是你的决斗对手。

每当你使用单个单手近战武器命中该敌人，并且你的另一只手或其他手均为空手的话，便会使@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strike}的伤害获得环境加值，数值等同于你的武器造成的伤害骰数。

若你攻击决斗对手之外的生物，则会在伤害上承受环境减值，数值等同于你的武器造成的伤害骰数。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zytTsipimVTmPc5U]{协防招架 Selfless Parry} 专长 8

先决条件 决斗招架，决斗家入门

你将手中的钢铁如闪光般挥舞，并以此来保护周遭的伙伴。当你从决斗招架（Dueling Parry）中获得好处时，与你相邻的盟友也会在AC上获得+1环境加值。

若你具有@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mf2cdCRV8uowOMOm]{决斗反击 Dueling Riposte}专长，那么当有敌人在你的触及范围内对与你相邻的盟友作出打击，且掷出大失败时，你也可以使用该专长，而非只限在敌人的攻击对你掷出大失败时。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gHHnMCBi1gvG5wTL]{决斗技门徒 Student Of The Dueling Arts} 专长 12

先决条件 决斗家入门

你已经习得了大量的战斗技巧，且日复一日地进行练习。在你的日常准备期间，可以将任意数量的决斗家变体专长进行替换，更换为相应等级且满足选取条件的其他决斗家变体专长。你无法以此方式替换决斗家入门（Duelist Dedication）和决斗技门徒（Student of The Dueling Arts）。

此外，你能通过增加一个进入架势所需要的的动作数量（通常为变成两个动作），来进入某个你不具有的决斗家专长所提供的架势（比如补充专长所列出的专长）。你仍旧需要满足相应专长的先决条件。

Edgewatch Detective.name: Edgewatch Detective
Edgewatch Detective.description:
Edgewatch Detective

You're a specially trained detective for the Edgewatch guard precinct in Absalom.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6b8DiNx4c1zPZ7RP]{Edgewatch Detective Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 智力 14 or Wisdom 14

You become trained in Society or Thievery; if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can use Perception instead of Survival to Track, and you gain the Experienced Tracker skill feat.

特殊 直至选取另外两个Edgewatch Detective变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iyXw5PnevT2jT8kU]{Sense Alignment} 专长 4

先决条件 Edgewatch Detective Dedication

You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos. The GM rolls a secret Perception check, comparing the result against the target's Deception DC.

大成功 You ascertain the target's alignment.

成功 You ascertain the target's alignment, but only along one axis (your choice of either the good-evil axis or the lawful-chaotic axis).

Failure You do not learn the target's alignment.

Critical Failure You incorrectly ascertain the target's alignment, misidentifying their alignment along either one axis or both (GM's choice).

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z8bozNJvUjBoKLPA]{Arcane Sensitivity} 专长 6

先决条件 Edgewatch Detective Dedication

You can sense the presence of the supernatural, even if you don't have any magical ability yourself. You can spend a single action (this action has the concentrate trait) to determine if any magical auras are present in the area. This has the effects of a 1st-level detect magic spell but isn't magical. By straining, you can also discover the source of the magic and its school (with the effect of a 4th-level detect magic spell), but doing so prevents you from using this ability again until you've rested for 8 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation} 专长 6

先决条件 Edgewatch Detective Dedication

Frequency Three times per day

You focus your attention on a single creature within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a Will save against your Perception DC. On a failure, the creature finds itself unable to speak any deliberate and intentional lies and takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. On a critical failure, the penalty to Deception checks is -4. This effect lasts for 10 minutes as long as you are within 30 feet of the target and the target is aware that you are using the ability against it. If you begin a new interrogation, this effect ends for any previous target. After your interrogation ends, the target is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Eldritch Archer.name: 魔射手 Eldritch Archer
Eldritch Archer.description:
魔射手 Eldritch Archer

虽然许多射手只是将自身战技看作从战斗手段中脱胎的一种艺术形式，然而还有小部分射手会寻求通过魔法来将这种技术变得完美，你就是他们中的一员。你使用魔法天赋来增强运动和武术上的能力，用弓和弩达到罕有人企及的阶段――将弓矢和弩弹化为魔法弹药、让箭笔直射向目标、用箭矢来传递法术甚至死亡。

尽管具有施法能力会增强你作为魔射手的潜在灵活性和力量，但仅仅擅长施法可无法一窥此等技艺的奥秘，你还要研究有关的弓之魔术来完成它。

补充专长：20级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WVm2dxPOI4tK2wsJ]{箭如雨下(魔射手) Impossible Volley (Eldritch Archer)}

精灵之箭 ELVEN ARROWS

将魔法能量灌入弓箭中的能力通常被视为一种精灵魔法。最初将魔箭作为一种武技进行钻研的或许确实是精灵，而且很多魔射手确实是精灵和半精灵，但其他人也可以学习并钻研出自己的魔射手之道。

有传闻说在南方的偏远地区，有人将毕生奉献于元素射术的研究，乌斯克伍德Uskwood中的暗影猎人会使用依赖阴影魔法的技巧。有些让人不安的传闻说魔鬼也开发出了地狱形态的魔法射术，据称这种技巧能诱捕灵魂困入地狱――尽管只是短暂的效果。就像魔法有各种形式一般，魔法射术也将会在多元宇宙的诸多践行者手中不断发展延伸。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oyLkqhDGwGGj40ME]{魔射手入门 Eldritch Archer Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 至少一种类型的弓弩达到受训熟练度

将魔法与射术融合，并由此引出强大的力量。

若你还未能通过法术位施放法术，你习得自发施法并获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell}行动。你获得一个法术库，内含一个自选戏法，戏法所处法术列表亦自选。所选戏法需从所选法术列表的常见法术或其它你已有权使用的法术中选择。此戏法必须需要进行法术攻击检定。你在此类根源的法术攻击检定和法术DC上的熟练度变为受训。你使用这些法术的关键施法属性为魅力。

如果你已经具备消耗法术位施法的能力，你从你的法术根源中学会一个额外戏法。如果你是准备施法者，你可以每天额外准备一个戏法；如果你是自发施法者，将此戏法加入你的法术库。

你还会获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DS9sDOWkXrz2xmHi]{魔弹射击 Eldritch Shot}。

特殊 直至选取另外两个魔射手变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5MG4dBTsFZVbHcX7]{基础魔射手施法 Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting} 专长 8

先决条件 魔射手入门

你获得基础施法能力的好处。每当你由此变体获得新法术环级的法术位时，将一个相应法术环级的法术加入到你的法术库中，这可以是你所选择的根源的常见法术，或者是该根源中你已经习得或发现的其他法术。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.m8iP2OCzit9WUrMD]{惑控之箭 Enchanting Arrow} 专长 8

先决条件 魔射手入门

随着风中的一句低语，你可以用弹药来让敌人面对你的攻击时更加脆弱。

用弓作出一次打击。命中时，目标承受额外[[/r {2d6}[mental]]]{2d6点心灵伤害}。大成功时，目标还会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。若你的弓上具有高等强击符文，此心灵伤害会增加至3d6点；若弓上具有上等强击符文则变为4d6点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vUFvcrvszXlHvz2Y]{灌魔箭矢 Magic Arrow} 专长 8

先决条件 魔射手入门

频率 每轮一次

你将魔力灌入到弹药中。当你选取该专长时，从核心手册或GnG中选择3种常见魔法弹药，这些弹药的等级为4级或更低。你的GM可以允许你选择其他类型的魔法弹药，比如罕见弹药或者其他书中的弹药。

当你使用灌魔箭矢时，你将非魔法箭矢或弩矢变化为你所选择的一类弹药。你必须在你的回合结束之前发射这些弹药，否则魔法便会消散。若弹药具有启动一栏，你仍旧需要花费相应的动作在射出弹药前启动它。

当你使用灌魔箭矢时，能够选择将一类魔法弹药应用至通常来说不适用、且你正在使用的弹药类型上——举例说明，你可以把@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.n5L7HE9H8jn8ftQy]{攀爬矢 Climbing Bolt}应用到箭矢上，即便该类魔法弹药通常来说只出现在弩矢也可以。

特殊 你能够多次选取该专长。每当你选取该专长时，要按照上述限制选择3种额外的弹药类型。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MlxfNv98LZKfYl64]{珍奇箭矢 Precious Arrow} 专长 8

先决条件 魔射手入门

你将一种珍贵材料的魔法本质灌入到一枚弹药之中，让你可以利用敌人的弱点进行针对攻击。

选择寒铁或银；若你在回合结束前射出箭矢，那么它会被视同为此类材料。在14级时，将精金加入到你能选择的材料列表中。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eoEYZJNdmvA5GfyK]{专家魔射手施法 Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting} 专长 12

先决条件 基础魔射手施法

你获得专家施法能力。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.roItUHUbBqhHfwJr]{寻踪箭矢 Seeker Arrow} 专长 14

先决条件 魔射手入门

你射出的箭在转角移动并以不可能的角度射向目标。用弓作出一次打击对抗你能看到的一个敌人；弹药会飞向目标，即便需要拐弯也无妨。你忽略目标的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态和所有掩蔽。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LRSTjjBNNlD0XZX8]{穿透箭矢 Phase Arrow} 专长 16

先决条件 魔射手入门

频率 每天一次

你能凝聚大量的魔力来创造出一发弹药，这发弹药能透过任何事物直击目标。

用弓弩作出一次打击对抗一个对你来说@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{可见 Observed}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}的敌人，但不能是@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}。

弹药会沿直线飞向目标，穿过任何路径上的非魔法屏障或墙壁，不过魔法屏障仍旧能停下箭矢。此次射击忽略所有掩蔽、隐蔽状态、藏匿状态和AC上由于盾牌而获得的环境加值。它还会在对抗穿戴任何类型护甲的生物时，命中检定上获得+4状态加值。

使用非魔法盾牌进行的@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block}反应动作无法降低此次打击的伤害。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6iOLxitjqHujH1Tj]{夺命箭矢 Arrow of Death} 专长 18

先决条件 魔射手入门

频率 每天一次

你对1根箭矢或弩失下咒，使其能在一次有效地射击中为你的目标带来死亡。用弓作出一次打击。命中时，你造成额外[[/r 10d10]]精准伤害。大成功时，目标还必须成功通过强韧豁免检定对抗你的职业DC或法术DC，以较高者为准。失败则会立即被杀死；此次豁免具有死亡和失能特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6kz7FPdxDrsPiNti]{大师魔射手施法 Master Eldritch Archer Spellcasting} 专长 18

先决条件 专家魔射手施法

你获得大师施法能力。

Eldritch Researcher.name: Eldritch Researcher
Eldritch Researcher.description:
Eldritch Researcher

An eager student of occult lore, you enjoy reading rare or forgotten tomes with ancient rituals and hidden secrets. You connect disparate facts to unlock deeper mysteries and uncover the truths of the universe, and you zealously hoard the knowledge your painstaking research produces. Aberrations fascinate you for many reasons, not the least of which is because their anatomy is wholly alien and yet, to the insightful, eminently sensible.

You've been particularly enlightened by the accumulated lore in Thresholds of Truth, and you know Zarmavdian was a kindred soul in occult research. With this book in hand, you feel like you stand at the doorway to unprecedented occult discoveries. You scoff at those fools who claim you meddle in things mortals aren't meant to know-for isn't it the duty of the enlightened to gather the universe's deepest truths?

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lslR2UfP3ze7TFYu]{Eldritch Researcher Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in Arcana and Occultism

You gain the ability to cast a single arcane or occult cantrip of your choice (which is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up). If you weren't already, you become trained in that traditions spell DCs and spell attack rolls with Intelligence as your spellcasting ability.

Regardless of whether you choose an arcane or occult cantrip, you also become an expert in your choice of either Arcana or Occultism. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks you attempt with the chosen skill when Investigating or Identifying Magic.

特殊 直至选取另外两个eldirtch researcher变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vVqOBzWTpWirPbrK]{Seeker of Truths} 专长 4

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

Your devotion to discovering and hoarding abstruse truths borders on the fanatical, and you can bring this devotion to bear. You gain the cleric's Domain Initiate feat but must select knowledge, secrecy, or truth as your domain. You cast that domain's domain spell as a focus spell of the same tradition as your cantrip from Eldritch Researcher Dedication, and you Refocus by contemplating abstruse mysteries rather than praying to a god. When an ability would manifest a divine symbol-such as the word of truth focus spell-it instead manifests as a strange shape unique to you that seems to defy geometry.

特殊 You can take this feat up to three times, selecting a different domain each time.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WPHq7MWHlGWpTnme]{Strange Script} 专长 4

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

You have such familiarity with obscure texts that you can compel them to reveal their secrets. Once per day, you can touch a single text (such as a tome, a wall of hieroglyphics, or something similar) and understand its meaning for 1 hour. If the text is in multiple languages, you gain the ability to understand them all for only the purposes of reading the text. If the text is in a code or cypher, you don't automatically understand the text, but you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to decipher it.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rFlBoYGI5OmfMvaO]{Scholarly Defense} 专长 6

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

Your knowledge of strange creatures and their bizarre anatomy allows you to anticipate their physical attacks and reduce the damage you take from them. You gain resistance to physical damage from melee attacks made by aberrations and oozes. This resistance is equal to one-third your level.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.oSi9mUtYWYekxX0B]{Able Ritualist} 专长 8

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

Your readings on rituals make you a skilled participant. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to primary and secondary checks you attempt as part of casting a ritual.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cdeVm8fTDzrP71Sw]{Lorefinder} 专长 8

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

You know that fate sometimes conspires to keep dangerous knowledge or items from the eyes of those most able to understand them. You deny fate the ability to conceal truths from you. You can cast locate as an innate occult spell once per day. When you reach 14th level, this spell is heightened to 5th level.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EBqnbiuVL0ULFJWX]{Know It All (Eldritch Researcher)} 专长 10

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled. When you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a Knowledge check, at the GM's discretion you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UZDiqc5bBJzOTxUQ]{Advanced Seeker of Truths} 专长 12

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication, Seeker of Truths

You have unlocked deeper secrets to uncovering and hoarding lore. You gain an advanced domain spell from one domain you selected with Seeker of Truths. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

特殊 You can take this feat up to three times, each time selecting a different advanced domain spell from a domain you selected with Seeker of Truths.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JgidFws6bOoGQcti]{Words of Unraveling} 专长 12

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual. Once per day as an occult innate spell, you can cast daydreamer's curse , outcast's curse, or savant's curse. At the GM's discretion, you can substitute or add additional occult curse spells of 4th level or lower to this list. You can choose a different spell from the list each time you use this ability. If you couldn't already cast occult spells, these spells use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells; if you could already cast occult spells, your proficiency in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells increases to expert.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8nCxI2SZ64UmMuRZ]{Entities From Afar} 专长 14

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

You can call in aberrations to fight for you or to answer questions. You can cast summon entity as an innate occult spell once per day. If you couldn't already cast occult spells, these spells use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells; if you could already cast occult spells, your proficiency in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells increases to expert.

As soon as the aberration arrives, instead of giving it any other commands, you can demand that it help you with a single question you pose to it. For the creature to effectively answer, you must Sustain the Spell for 1 minute, and you must understand and be understood by the aberration. If you do, the aberration gives you a cryptic clue as provided by the read omens spell, except that the clue is even more enigmatic than normal; the creature then immediately returns from whence it came without providing you any other benefit. At 16th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the summon entity spell is heightened by 1 level (to a maximum of 8th level when you reach 20th level).

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2l15VfVHMw3ttgJ3]{Incredible Recollection} 1 Feat 14

先决条件 Eldritch Researcher Dedication

You can sift through knowledge locked within your mind at an incredible pace. You instantly use up to 5 Recall Knowledge actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions.

Elementalist.name: 元素使 Elementalist
Elementalist.description:
元素使(职业变体) Elementalist (Class Archetype)

你敬畏四大元素——气、土、火和水——它们是创生的基石和生命的源头。你认为魔法的诞生源自这四种元素的平衡、混合和重新排列。这种信念让你避开了传统的魔法理论和学派划分，转而专注于控制、操纵和塑造这四大元素。你能够使用来自多个根源的法术，利用这四大元素来调整和增强自身法术，以独特的方式显现或混合它们。大多数元素使会均衡地看待四大元素，并将其视为一个神秘的整体，他们每日都在强化自身与其中某种元素的联系以免自身受到侵害。而其他人，尤其是那些崇尚此等学说的术士和法师们，则与某一种元素有着更强的联系，并将此磨练至极限，利用其他三种元素里支持和增强他们偏爱的元素。

补充专长 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bcxIg7wi8ZAhvhOD]{魔宠 Familiar}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N7dTFxpjXGn4ddq8]{强化魔宠 Enhanced Familiar}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{流动超魔 Current Spell}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6gLWr3xghsHSFwxc]{渡水步 Water Step}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.pUkUC8HHom2DmYzz]{元素魔法 Elemental Magic}

每日当你进行日常准备时，能够让自身与一种自选元素同调：气、土、火或水。

你在对抗与你同调的元素特征的效果造成的伤害时，获得等同于你自身等级一半的抗力（最低1点抗力）。

这种同调会持续至你下一次进行日常准备为止。

特殊 直至选取另外两个元素使变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nroOy0PBeEUGdUXD]{浸水法术 Dousing Spell} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication}

你用水元素来增强自己的法术，并以此来浸透目标。

若你的下一个动作是以单个生物为目标施法，则会用水浸透目标。若目标具有@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续酸液或火焰伤害}，结束这些状态的DC降低至10点，并且该生物能够立即尝试一次纯骰检定来结束这些类型的持续伤害。该法术获得水特征（这会使该法术对将水视为弱点的生物造成额外伤害）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KZJJ0WxcRd4RZKJR]{元素魔宠 Elemental Familiar} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bcxIg7wi8ZAhvhOD]{魔宠 Familiar}

你的魔宠变为能够呈现四大元素各个面向的元素精魂：气、土、火或水。除了魔宠会呈现出元素而非动物的形态以外，此魔宠在所有其他方面都继续使用其他魔宠相同的规则。

你的魔宠每日均会获得一个额外魔宠能力，但该魔宠能力必须在后文中的元素魔宠能力中选取。当你的魔宠具有任一元素魔宠能力时，它便会由相关的元素物质构成，而且获得相关的元素特征。你在同一时间选择的元素魔宠能力数量不得超过一个。

  • 气 若你的魔宠在1轮内完全静止不动，它就会变得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}，持续至它下次进行一次行动为止。任何运动，甚至是被其他生物移动或携带，均会终止该效果。
  • 土 你的魔宠获得对物理伤害（精金除外）的抗力，数值等同于你的等级的一半。
  • 火 你的魔宠发出半径20尺的明亮光照（并对继续延伸的20尺半径发出昏暗光照），而且会辐射热量。停留在魔宠周围半径@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15尺弥漫}区域内的生物不会由于严寒环境而承受伤害。
  • 水 你的魔宠能够穿过至少2英寸宽的缝隙且不被视为@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{挤入空间 Squeezing}，而且能够在挤入空间的状态下穿过1英寸宽的缝隙。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bVng7Mkrj4UnQzLo]{燃烧法术 Burning Spell} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication}

你用火元素增强自身的法术，让它能够引燃目标。

若你的下一个动作是施放非戏法法术，且会对单个目标造成伤害，那么除了该法术的其他效果之外，它还会造成额外@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}，数值等同于法术环级。该专长对原本就能够造成持续火焰伤害的法术无效。

该法术获得火特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.URtcR1BU2OgfKHfm]{元素代谢 Metabolize Element} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication}

触发 你由于敌人的法术或魔法能力而承受伤害，且上述法术或能力具有气、土、火焰或水特征。

你迅速代谢敌人法术中的元素粒子，并获得爆发性的能量。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态，持续至你的下个回合结束为止。你只能使用这个额外动作快步或行走。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.U9SrWgLJ8JoAKIy0]{崩岩法术 Rockslide Spell} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication}

你用土元素增强自身的法术，让巨大石块散落于地面。

若你的下一个动作是施放非戏法法术，且会影响一片区域，此区域内的数个5尺方格会变为困难地形，方格数量等同于法术环级，持续1轮。这些方格必须在地面上，而且全部困难地形的区域必须是连续的。

该法术获得土特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AmV13b9ncALtWJFt]{元素偏转 Redirect Elements} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication}

触发 敌人的具有元素特征的法术以你为目标作出法术攻击检定，且投掷出失败或大失败时

你夺取了向你发射的法术的元素精华，并将法术重定向至法术区域内你所选择的一名生物。攻击者要重掷法术的攻击检定对抗新目标。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TdA3oVj79KxOm2Kd]{风掷法术 Wind-Tossed Spell} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{元素使入门 Elementalist Dedication}

你用气元素增强自身的法术，用风来寻找目标并带着魔法绕过掩体。

若你的下一个动作是施法而且该法术需要投掷法术攻击检定，则你能忽略目标的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态以及任何他们对你具有的掩蔽。

法术获得气特征。

Exorcist.name: Exorcist
Exorcist.description:
Exorcist

You pacify restless spirits, ghosts, and haunts, capturing fragments of them and using their vengeful energies to fuel your own powers while purifying the spirit. You store these ghosts within a magical vessel called a spirit dwelling. This spirit dwelling might be a treasured family heirloom, an item you crafted expressly to help with exorcisms, or even just an odd trinket you found that happens to do the job.

While the motivations of exorcists run the gamut, most are compassionate individuals who believe that every ghost, haunt, and spirit is simply a lost soul in need of rest. They collect spirits expressly for the purposes of offering them comfort, guidance, and absolution. After an exorcist's ministrations, these spirits are freed of their burdens, emotion, and regrets and are reabsorbed into the River of Souls. Although exorcists rarely gather in one place, many different religions employ them to deal with spiritual threats.

Exorcists are most commonly found among the faithful of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.DJ7LDFTtns6YFodT]{Ashava} the True Spark (the empyreal lord of dancers), but among the major deities of the Inner Sea region, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.BNycwu3I21dTh4D9]{Sarenrae}，@Compendium[pf2e.deities.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{Pharasma}, and even @Compendium[pf2e.deities.gxwmzxUWBOhdgFSN]{Shelyn} count a fair number of exorcists among their faithful. Exorcists can come from any walk of life, but many are redeemer champions, clerics, or monks. Apart from the role of the spirit dwelling, exorcism practices can vary. For example, a bard or rogue might attract spirits with trickery, charm, or empty promises. In contrast, a cleric of Pharasma could take a more severe route, demanding the spirits return to the natural order of things.

Additional Feats: 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HB0jvWCdim1p91q1]{Spiritual Sense}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.y2XeMe1F18lIyo59]{Blind-Fight}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EnpbhZr94ZyZI4hb]{Sense Evil}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DM9rjXZrmx2MFX7k]{Sense The Unseen}

SPIRIT DWELLINGS AND REMNANTS

A spirit dwelling can be any object, from an everyday item like a mirror, hand bell, or gemstone, to a custom clockwork device, so long as it can be held in one hand, is light Bulk, and doesn't serve another function (such as a weapon, shield, consumable, or magic item). Your spirit dwelling has the trait of the magical tradition used to take Exorcist Dedication and the necromancy trait. Your spirit dwelling is attuned to you, so only you can use it. If your spirit dwelling is lost or stolen, you can turn another object into a new spirit dwelling with a 1-hour ritual; this causes your previous spirit dwelling to revert to a mundane object and any spirits within to harmlessly disperse.

Your spirit dwelling can house not just wisps but greater remnants of spiritual energy left behind by defeated ghosts and haunts. You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.LWrR6UiGm3eCAALJ]{Collect Spirit Remnant} activity.

Rejuvenating Spirits: Though all spirit wisps and most remnants can pass on immediately when purified, if a spirit remnant came from a creature with the rejuvenation special ability (such as most ghosts), a recurring haunt, or another entity who ordinarily doesn't pass on when destroyed, its ties to this world are too strong for it to easily pass on. When a spirit remnant from such an entity is released as part of your daily preparations, instead of joining the River of Souls, it begins re-forming itself in the time and location noted in its rejuvenation ability. However, you learn a clue about the spirit's unfinished business, which may help you put it to rest permanently.

EXORCISTS ACROSS GOLARION

The well-known exorcists of Pharasma use methods of repeated prayer, holy water, and sacred rituals. Ashavic exorcists often dance under the moonlight to entice lost souls and guide them onward. In Osirion, exorcists practice execration, or proactive preventive exorcism techniques. In Northern Garund and some parts of Qadira, playing the stringed tanbura, rattling manjur, and specific drum patterns help cut the threads that tie the spirit to this world. Matanji orcs in the Mwangi Expanse perform exorcisms by drawing tattoo-like diagrams in iron ink. In Tian Xia, exorcists often use fulus (Secrets of Magic 158) to assist in their practice.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TUIQBw9miDowhezw]{Exorcist Dedication} 专长 4

先决条件 trained in Occultism or Religion

You've learned to attract, quell, and purify spirits, housing them in a special receptacle called a spirit dwelling until they're ready to move on. Through the power of prayers or ritual incantations, one mundane object in your possession becomes a spirit dwelling (page 23). Your spirit dwelling functions as a lure for lost spirits weakened by their time on the Material Plane. Each day during your daily preparations, your spirit dwelling attracts a spirit wisp who comes to dwell inside. If your spirit dwelling contains no wisps, you can spend 10 minutes in a minor ritual to cast your spirit dwelling around an area and attract another wisp. You can also capture stronger spirit remnants from vanquished undead spirits, as explained in the sidebar on page 23. As long as your spirit dwelling contains any spirits, it glows faintly, casting dim light in a 10-foot radius.

As an exorcist, you do more than just collect spirits: you also help rid them of their burdens and lingering resentments, aiding their transition from the Material Plane. Every day, before your daily preparations, any spirit wisps and remnants remaining within your spirit dwelling from the previous day are purified and can join the River of Souls in their final journey to Pharasma's Boneyard.

You can also learn abilities that let you purify a spirit in your spirit dwelling immediately in a cathartic surge, granting you a helpful effect as they depart for the afterlife. Any actions you gain from the exorcist archetype gain either the divine or occult trait, depending on whether you used Occultism or Religion to qualify for Exorcist Dedication. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SPtzUNatWJvTK61y]{Spirit's Mercy} is the simplest of the purifications.

特殊 直至选取另外两个exorcist变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dVzPTpZoGSi5NR6y]{Cast Out} 专长 6

先决条件 Exorcist Dedication

You attempt to cast a malevolent entity out of the creature or object it's possessing. Roll a counteract check against the possession effect; you must be within 30 feet of the possessed creature or object to do so. Your counteract level is half your level rounded up, and your counteract modifier is your Occultism modifier, Religion modifier, or spell DC - 10, whichever is highest. If you succeed, the entity is driven out and can't attempt to possess that creature or object for 1 week. If you fail, the possessing creature is immune to your Cast Out for a year and a day.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.03mVGvudDLyGEpTZ]{Spirit's Absolution} 专长 6

先决条件 Exorcist Dedication

Cost 1 spirit wisp or spirit remnant from your spirit dwelling

需求 You are holding your spirit dwelling.

You purify a spirit by absolving it of its sins and regrets. This cathartic experience restores your Hit Points or those of an adjacent ally. If you expend a spirit wisp, the target recovers 1d4 Hit Points per level you have. If you expend a spirit remnant, the target recovers 1d6 Hit Points per level of the incorporeal undead or haunt from which you gained the remnant.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sIN6t7nCWdI5u1HK]{Spirit's Anguish} 专长 8

先决条件 Exorcist Dedication

Cost 1 spirit wisp or spirit remnant from your spirit dwelling

需求 You are holding your spirit dwelling.

You purify a spirit by coaxing it to release its anguish in a final cathartic howl. This deals sonic damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], with a basic Will save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If you expend a spirit wisp, this deals [[/r {1d4}[sonic]]]{1d4 sonic damage} per level you have. If you expend a spirit remnant, this deals [[/r {1d6}[sonic]]]{1d6 sonic damage} per level of the incorporeal undead or haunt from which you gained the remnant.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vqHF9U2RkL2NVgMF]{Enticing Dwelling} 专长 12

先决条件 Exorcist Dedication

Your spirit dwelling is particularly inviting to spirit wisps. During your daily preparations, and whenever you spend 10 minutes to find more wisps, you entice two wisps into your spirit dwelling instead of one.

Familiar Master.name: 魔宠大师 Familiar Master
Familiar Master.description:
魔宠大师 Familiar Master

从立于法师肩膀上的睿智猫头鹰，到为了自己的目的而侍奉女巫的狡猾小魔怪，从炼金术士实验室里那可怕的人造人，到根据窃贼的命令溜门撬锁的聪明猴子，魔宠们一直在为主人服务。无论是通过严格训练还是进行超自然链接，你所得到的服务远比上述主人更好。

补充专长：4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N7dTFxpjXGn4ddq8]{强化魔宠 Enhanced Familiar}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4zaU3GlTGMNqLFS8]{魔宠大师入门 Familiar Master Dedication} 专长 2

你与一只生物构筑起神秘联系。这可能会涉及到复杂的仪式或咒语，比如直至从森林中有什么生物靠近你为止一直在月下冥想。或者也许你只是作出了对彼此都好的行为，比如从敌人或陷阱中救出对方，然后在陷入危机时被对方所救。

无论细节如何，你和它会成为伙伴，直至死亡把你们分开。你获得一只魔宠。若你有已经具有了一只魔宠，则获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N7dTFxpjXGn4ddq8]{强化魔宠 Enhanced Familiar} 专长。

特殊 直至选取另外两个魔宠大师变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Hwvrive2vBIqZUcE]{吉祥物魔宠 Familiar Mascot} 专长 4

先决条件 魔宠大师入门

你的魔宠是冒险团队的核心与灵魂。

在选择主人能力时，你能选择1名盟友从任意特定主人能力中获益。

每个主人能力仅能对单个角色产生好处，而且除非能力另有说明，否则每个特定主人能力只能被你选择一次。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IYt6pMqiTocTrixA]{导魔魔宠 Familiar Conduit} 专长 4

先决条件 魔宠大师入门, 能够施法

需求 你与你的魔宠有效果线相连

在你的指导下，你的魔宠愈发熟悉隐藏于此世之中魔法流向，它能够成为传导你的魔法的导体。若你的下个动作是@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell}，且该法术具有射程，那么此法术可以用你的魔宠作为法术起始点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9C6a6FXuPqWjXy8K]{精通魔宠 Improved Familiar} 专长 6

先决条件 魔宠大师入门

你觉得吸引一只强大且不寻常的魔宠在身边是件轻松的事情。将你的魔宠变为特殊魔宠所需要的能力数量比正常少两个。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ADgFB8hjUgcXS4bF]{多面手魔宠 Mutable Familiar} 专长 8

先决条件 魔宠大师入门

你魔宠的超自然灵魂比其肉体看起来的更加庞大。你能够执行1项持续10分钟的特殊行动，并以此来重选某些魔宠能力，将其中一个或更多个后述能力切换列表中的其他能力：两栖（amphibious），掘地（burrower），攀援（climber），黑暗视觉（darkvision），快速移动（fast movement），心灵手巧（manual dexterity），能量抗力（resistance）和灵敏嗅觉（scent）。

你只能重选每日重选能力时可以正常重选的魔宠能力，对魔宠需要的魔宠能力无效。若某个魔宠能力是其他魔宠能力所需要的能力，那么你也无法将其替换；举例说明：若你的魔宠有实验助手（Lab Assistant），则无法移除心灵手巧（Manual dextierity）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KcNXoSvULnuQjC9a]{神奇魔宠 Incredible Familiar} 专长 10

先决条件 强化魔宠

你的魔宠所能接受的魔力比其他魔宠更多。你每天能够选择6个魔宠或主人能力，以取代原本的4个。

Firebrand Braggart.name: Firebrand Braggart
Firebrand Braggart.description:
Firebrand Braggart

Many Firebrands travel the Inner Sea region drawing attention to themselves, making great shows of their exploits, and proclaiming their great deeds.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NagTqSLK8bAlo2nY]{Firebrand Braggart Dedication} 专长 4

先决条件 魅力14, second mark member of the Firebrands

Your Firebrand training has taught you that achieving something is more satisfying if you boast about it first. You declare a boast about a particular skill action, such as Balance, Demoralize, or Recall Knowledge. The first time you attempt this action within the next minute in a context the GM deems both suitably challenging and meaningful, you must roll twice and use the lower result. If you succeed at this check, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to attempt the same action for 10 minutes. If you fail this check or don't attempt the action within 1 minute, you instead take a -1 circumstance penalty on checks to attempt the same action for 1 hour.

If the chosen action can be used with multiple skills, such as Identify Magic or Recall Knowledge, you must specify which skill you are using for that particular action, such as using Arcana to Identify Magic, and your bonus or penalty after the boast applies only to checks using that skill for that action. Once you declare a boast about a particular action, you cannot declare a boast about the same action until the next time you make daily preparations, regardless of whether you succeed or fail at the check.

Typically a challenging task is one with at least a standard DC for your level, though the difficulty may be higher depending on the situation. A meaningful context is one where the action's success or failure is relevant to the pursuit of your goals, rather than a boast you made simply to gain a bonus later.

特殊 直至选取另外两个Firebrand Braggart变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UtUT6JngJbQRHySX]{Boaster's Challenge} 专长 6

先决条件 expert in Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation; Firebrand Braggart Dedication

You call out a foe, causing them to become flustered and easier to defeat. Select one creature you can see and declare a challenge. For your challenge, attempt a Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation check against that creature's Will DC. Your challenge must include a linguistic, auditory, or visual component and gains the corresponding trait. If you succeed, you gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with your weapon or unarmed Strikes against that foe until the end of your next turn; if you have master proficiency in the skill you used, you gain a +4 status bonus instead, and if you're legendary, you gain a +6 status bonus. On a critical success, the status bonus lasts for 3 rounds instead. Whether you succeed or fail, creatures who witnessed your challenge gain a +4 circumstance bonus to their Will DCs against your attempts to challenge for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cny7ouhsoiNsWJ7X]{Daring Act} 专长 6

先决条件 trained in Acrobatics or Athletics, Firebrand Braggart Dedication

You attempt a death-defying maneuver to distract your enemies. Select one foe within reach and attempt either an Acrobatics or Athletics check against your target's Reflex DC. If you succeed, you can Stride up to half your Speed (or up to your full Speed if you critically succeed) without triggering reactions from the target due to your movement, and the target is flat-footed against the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YTZhLWtrEnV9Pjf2]{Bravo's Determination} 专长 8

先决条件 expert in Deception, Firebrand Braggart Dedication

触发 A foe's Strike reduces you to 0 Hit Points; you were not at 1 Hit Point and you would not be killed.

Your confidence borders on self-delusion, but it keeps you going against overwhelming odds. Attempt a Deception check against the attack DC of the triggering Strike. You take a penalty to this check equal to twice your wounded value, if any. If the triggering attack was a critical hit, use the result one degree of success worse than what you rolled.

大成功 You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point.
成功 You avoid being knocked out and remain at 1 Hit Point, but you increase your wounded value by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4Ek3Kyle2DsCPQQm]{Great Boaster} 专长 10

先决条件 魅力16, Firebrand Braggart Dedication

Your bragging is particularly effective. If you succeed at a boast, you can attempt a great boast about that same skill by using your Firebrand Braggart Dedication action about the same action during the duration of your original boast's circumstance bonus; this is an exception to the rule that you can't make another boast about the same action until your next daily preparations. A great boast uses the Firebrand Braggart Dedication action, except that if you succeed, your circumstance bonus increases to +2 and remains for 1 hour. If you fail the great boast, you take a -2 circumstance penalty to attempt the same action for 4 hours. Once you declare a great boast about a particular action, you can't declare a great boast about the same action until the next time you make daily preparations, regardless of whether you succeed or fail at the check. The minimum challenging task for a great boast is one with at least a hard DC for your level.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O1C6pMTOxIrWBO3G]{Daring Flourish} 专长 10

先决条件 Daring Act

You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts. At the end of a successful Daring Act, you can make a melee Strike against the target or attempt to Disarm the target. The target is flat-footed against the Strike you make during Daring Act as well as the next melee attack you attempt against it before the end of your turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n0693gmx3k9wvb1N]{Demanding Challenge} 专长 10

先决条件 Boaster's Challenge

If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a -1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or -2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6DkylvU5RF1O6DTT]{Daredevil's Gambit} 专长 12

先决条件 Daring Act

If you critically succeed at your Daring Act, you can enter the target's space and remain there until the beginning of your next turn or until the target moves, whichever comes first. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, and your target is flat-footed against your attacks while you are sharing its space in this way. If any creature other than your target hits you with an attack roll while you are sharing your target's space, attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:15]. On a success, resolve the attack against the target instead of you, using the same attack roll result that hit you.

Firework Technician.name: Firework Technician
Firework Technician.description:
Firework Technician

稀有度 罕见

The brilliant display of cascading lights and flickering aerial flowers, the thunderous boom, the sizzling crackle, and piercing screech—these are the stock and trade of your craft. You know how to perfectly pair light and sound to create fireworks displays that can amaze children and adults, comfort friends, and even confound your foes.

As a fireworks technician, you might be an itinerant wanderer, roaming from town to town and developing your craft on your own. In that case, you make a living on the road, selling fireworks to the townsfolk, setting up public displays upon request and receipt of payment, and even tailoring individualized performances to those wealthy or interesting enough to be worthy of receiving their own private show.

On the other hand, you might be part of an established fireworks house from Tian Xia or Vudra and rely on teamwork to perfect your various formulas and displays. Hoping to produce the next great innovation in fireworks technology, you often send back the notes from your studies and field demonstrations to esteemed colleagues from your fireworks house, seeking their opinions on your next big idea.

Describing Your Fireworks Display

As a firework technician, the exact visuals of your character's special abilities might matter significantly to you. No two firework technicians use exactly the same fireworks display, even if they come from the same fireworks house and both use the same feat to generate the display. In fact, it's likely that when you use a feat from the firework technician archetype, the resulting display remains a bit different each time as you tinker, perfect, and refine your technique. Even so, you probably have a few themes that you prefer for each of your firework technician feats. For instance, your Coughing Dragon Display might appear in the sinuous serpentine shape of a literal imperial dragon, coughing out glittering trails. It might also resemble a simple series of geometric shapes, an enigmatic spiraling aeon trailing off in a shape with radial symmetry, a pattern shaped like a tree blossoming with flowers in the sky, or anything else you can imagine. To help your fellow players visualize what your character is doing, you might come up with some go-to descriptions or draw art depicting some of your favorite displays.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MVbNnjqQOK9d8Ki3]{Firework Technician Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in Crafting

You've learned the secrets of making fire and sound bloom using black powder, metals, and paper. You most likely came by this knowledge through formal training with a fireworks house in Tian Xia or a fireworks company from Vudra, though perhaps you mastered fireworks completely by yourself after finding a secret stash in an old shipwreck.

You become trained in Fireworks Lore or become an expert if you were already trained in it. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.is3Oz9wt11lNq62K]{Alchemical Crafting} feat, a pool of @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.wySB9VHOW1v3TX1L]{Infused Reagents} equal to your level, and @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{Advanced Alchemy} (allowing you to make alchemical items during your daily preparations without the normal cost or time expenditure). You can use your infused reagents only to make fireworks, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yUjuLbBMflVum8Yn]{Launch Fireworks Display}, and use other feats from this archetype. Your advanced alchemy level is 1. If you gain infused reagents from more than one source, you use the highest number of reagents to determine your pool rather than adding them together.

You can also create special fireworks displays using your infused reagents, designed to create distinctive effects you can use to make onlookers marvel and even to gain an advantage in combat. You gain the Launch Fireworks Display action and learn some basic displays, and you can learn additional, more complex displays through other firework technician feats. The DC for any display is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the fireworks technician变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qAVM65grmny3f8DP]{Coughing Dragon Display} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MVbNnjqQOK9d8Ki3]{Firework Technician Dedication}

This display emits a cascade of loud bangs or glittering trails. While you initially designed the display to captivate your audience's attention, it turns out to have a surprisingly effective use in combat, suppressing auditory or visual effects behind your magnificent display. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.mech0dhb4eKbCAu0]{Coughing Dragon} fireworks display.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dDFQJem5K9Jzxgda]{Expert Fireworks Crafter} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MVbNnjqQOK9d8Ki3]{Firework Technician Dedication}, expert in Crafting

You're particularly adept at crafting fireworks, allowing you to create much more powerful fireworks than you otherwise could. Your advanced alchemy level for fireworks increases to your level - 3.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.T6Twdesb5niBhHuZ]{Jumping Jenny Display} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MVbNnjqQOK9d8Ki3]{Firework Technician Dedication}

This multi-sequence rocket blasts confetti at a series of altitudes. While the design is intended to delight children of all ages, you've found it has an unexpected side effect of confounding enemy fliers. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.wt6jdjjje16Nx34f]{Jumping Jenny} fireworks display.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pI5cG6x49ZQLchuy]{Goblin Jubilee Display} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MVbNnjqQOK9d8Ki3]{Firework Technician Dedication}

Flames and explosions sear the air in a riot of color and devastation that rivals that wrought by even the wildest goblin party. The display is both so beautiful and chaotic that, while mesmerizing, it poses a significant risk to the physical health, sight, and hearing of anyone who gets too close. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.izvfZ561JTdeyh6i]{Goblin Jubilee} fireworks display.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jsbe2d9lYGJ2MksT]{Banshee Cry Display} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MVbNnjqQOK9d8Ki3]{Firework Technician Dedication}

You've learned how to pull off a sudden noisemaker at just the right moment in your display, a technique that can disrupt precise wording. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.b3h3QqvwS5fnaiu1]{Banshee Cry} fireworks display.

Flexible Spellcaster.name: 灵活施法者 Flexible Spellcaster
Flexible Spellcaster.description:
灵活施法者（职业变体） Flexible Spellcaster (Class Archetype)

你懂得如何灵活地施放法术，以减少每日施法的次数为代价，将自发与准备施法的最佳元素融合在一起。

受限的法术位 Restricted Spell Slots

当使用了本变体的职业获得具有限制条件的额外法术位时，比如专精法师的专精学派法术或者牧师的神力源泉，你仍旧会获得这些额外法术位，但他们的运作方式同你原本的职业相同，而且这些法术不会被添加到你的法术集合内。治疗源泉仍旧会为你能够施放的最高环级添加额外法术位来施放治疗术，但不会把治疗术添加到你的法术集合内。伤害源泉也会如此处理伤害术。作为专精法师，你能在每个环级准备一个你所专精学派的法术，但该法术不会被添加到你的法术集合中。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CrS0iDwHmjKqvKti]{灵活施法者入门 Flexible Spellcaster Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Upf1LXtWNJ6eB5sm]{灵活备法 Flexible Spell Preparation}

现在你每日有4个戏法而非原本的3个。在4级时，你每日有5个戏法而非4个。

Folklorist.name: Folklorist
Folklorist.description:
Folklorist

稀有度 罕见

Folklorists are welcome across the Mwangi Expanse for the entertaining stories they tell and the counsel they impart. However, those who take the art of storytelling to the next level can produce magical effects based on their understanding of stories and their firm belief that life conforms to the contours of these tales. While many such folklorists are benevolent, terms like hero and villain are notoriously relative, changing to fit the perspective of the storyteller.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sG9fPQk4w9y6MmnY]{Folklorist Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in Performance

You are a master archivist and entertainer, capable of pulling wisdom from the tales you tell and weaving your allies and enemies into a powerful narrative. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.5gahZQXf3UVwATSC]{Spin Tale} action.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the folklorist变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MprbkBZUouqvbKGo]{Folktales Lore} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sG9fPQk4w9y6MmnY]{Folklorist Dedication}

You can pull bits of wisdom from any tale. You become trained in Folktales Lore, a special Lore skill that can be used only to Recall Knowledge, but on any topic. If you fail a check to Recall Knowledge with Folktales Lore, you get the effects of the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1Bt7uCW2WI4sM84P]{Dubious Knowledge} skill feat.

If you are legendary in the Performance skill, you gain expert proficiency in Folktales Lore, but you can't increase your proficiency rank in Folktales Lore by any other means.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XusuxqmXWPYc0JYA]{Narrative Conduit} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sG9fPQk4w9y6MmnY]{Folklorist Dedication}

You act as a conduit for your companions just as your stories are a conduit between teller and listener. When you @Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.5gahZQXf3UVwATSC]{Spin a Tale} and the hero of your tale Casts a Spell against the villain, you warp the world, allowing the hero to calculate range and cover to the villain from your space instead of their own if they prefer. The hero must choose to calculate both range and cover from the same space; they can't use one space for range and the other for cover.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OtM4pvPeIeEEdpuS]{Rule of Three} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sG9fPQk4w9y6MmnY]{Folklorist Dedication}

需求 You have @Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.5gahZQXf3UVwATSC]{Spun a Tale}.

触发 The villain of the tale you've spun makes an attack roll with a given weapon or unarmed attack, uses a particular special ability (such as a Breath Weapon), or Casts a Spell against the hero, and they used that same attack, special ability, or spell against the hero on the previous turn.

Heroes learn from their previous failures, often succeeding on the third attempt. You narrate a tale of the hero's success, granting them a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC or saving throw against the triggering effect. If the villain has used the same effect against the hero on both of their last two turns, and you used Rule of Three on that effect last turn as well, the bonus increases to +4.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hsMcKK92ho39djgI]{Communal Tale} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sG9fPQk4w9y6MmnY]{Folklorist Dedication}

Stories are an experience meant to be shared as a group. When you @Compendium[pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.5gahZQXf3UVwATSC]{Spin a Tale}, you can designate up to six non-minion allies as the heroes of your story. Each hero, once during the tale, can continue the story in your stead by spending an action to Spin the Tale; if they do, the story continues for another round, as if you had Spun the Tale at the start of your turn. This could allow the story to continue for up to 6 additional rounds, if all possible allies Spin the Tale, though you can continue to Spin the Tale on your own as normal.

Game Hunter.name: Game Hunter
Game Hunter.description:
Game Hunter

Game hunters find, follow, and slay game animals, then honor their fallen rivals by securing and preserving a trophy of the kill. Many game hunters show a reverential respect for their prey bordering on the sacred. The finest game hunters engage only in a fair chase, strive for painless kills, and use every part of the animal's carcass.

补充专长 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.GFtNQvpzuqtsdOTG]{Hunter's Aim}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.meQJfsKVar9tm6c9]{Running Reload}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pbD4lfAPkK1NNag0]{Double Prey}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CowQy8gXP9POjuxq]{Game Hunter Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in Survival

You are skilled at tracking big game animals and similar creatures. You gain the Hunt Prey action, but you can designate only animals, beasts, and dragons as prey. In addition to the other benefits of Hunt Prey, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks against your hunted prey.

When you succeed at a Strike against your hunted prey while it's flat-footed}, it must attempt a Fortitude save against your class DC. On a failure, the prey's Speeds are each reduced by 10 feet for 1 round; on a critical failure, the duration of this effect is 1 minute. The prey is then temporarily immune to this effect for 10 minutes.

If you already have Hunt Prey, you become an expert in Survival. You apply the Stealth bonus and the Speed reduction only when your prey is an animal, beast, or dragon.

特殊 直至选取另外两个game hunter变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1j9QCzHHxi5MbIY3]{Big Game Trapper} 专长 4

先决条件 Snare Crafting, Game Hunter Dedication

You can set snares specifically for big prey, leaving smaller creatures unscathed. Each time you set a snare, you can choose Small, Medium, Large, or Huge. That snare can be triggered only by creatures of that size or larger.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.em3glccrJ5ZIf8Uq]{Keep Pace} 专长 6

先决条件 Game Hunter Dedication

When your hunted prey tries to bolt, you follow. You Stride up to your Speed, following your hunted prey and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you've moved your full Speed. You can use Keep Pace to Burrow, Climb, Fly, or Swim instead of Stride if you have the appropriate movement type.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E3NsAdbp7kkOvfnr]{Quick Positioning} 专长 8

先决条件 Game Hunter Dedication

需求 You could see your hunted prey when you rolled initiative at the beginning of the encounter, and this is your first action on your first turn of the encounter.

You're always ready to get the jump on your target. You Step up to twice.

Geomancer.name: 地卜师 Geomancer
Geomancer.description:
地卜师 Geomancer

你知道如何从周遭的大地中汲取力量，无论身处何种地形，你都能通过调整自身的魔力来与其神秘性质同调。

你可能是一名专注于元素的德鲁伊（比如火焰、岩石、波涛或风暴派系；详见本书元素论）或者懂得一些魔法的博物学家。你可以专注于单一种类的地形，榨干其中孕育的每一滴力量；或者也可以选择在大地上漫游，体验各式各样的地形。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 自然技能受训；从法术位中施放法术的能力；至少具有1个有着气、寒冷、土、火焰、植物或水特征的法术

无论你来自何处，都能感受到与这个世界的深厚联系，一种被称为“地形同调”的现象。当你消耗一个法术位来施放法术，且该法术具有的特征与你当前身处的地形种类相关（如后文所述），则会获得该类地形的地形同调效果。由GM判断同调是否适用，前提是这种地形在你周围要足够普遍。举例说明：当你在河岸或者船上时，可能会处于水域地形。与之相似的是，同一个地点可能属于多种地形，比如在极北之地的山脉同属于极地和山脉地形。在此情况下，你仅能选择一种地形同调效果，即便法术的特征适用于你身处的多个地形种类也只有一种同调效果。

某些地形同调会影响你的敌人而非你本人。在此情况下，你施放法术的时候会将地形同调列出的效果应用至所有与你相邻、位于法术区域或成为法术目标的敌人。这些敌人会按照后文列出的豁免检定对抗你的法术DC，并以此来尝试避免效果。

  • 水域 Aquatic (水) 你能驾驭波浪。若你在水中，则获得等同于你的陆上速度的游泳速度。若你在地面上，则暂时会有水浪跟随你移动，允许你用自己的游泳速度——若你有的话——作为你的陆上速度来移动。
  • 极地 Arctic (寒冷) 严寒会复盖你的敌人的身体。敌人必须尝试强韧豁免。他们的速度会承受-5尺状态减值（大失败为-10尺），持续2轮。
  • 沙漠 Desert (火焰) 沙漠的酷热会让你的敌人脱水。敌人必须尝试强韧豁免。失败时，敌人会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}直至饮水或喝下其他可饮用的液体为止。
  • 森林 Forest (植物) 树枝与藤蔓伸出来阻挡敌人的去路。敌人必须尝试反射豁免。失败时，他们会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}持续1轮（大失败为@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}）。
  • 山脉 Mountain (土) 山脉那坚韧的耐力会保护你免受伤害。你获得对抗物理伤害的抗力（精金除外），数值等同于法术环级，持续1轮。
  • 平原 Plains (植物) 成长的田野与平原那脉动的活力让你充满精力。你获得临时生命值，数值等同于法术环级，持续1轮。
  • 空域 Sky (气) 一阵强风将你卷起。你能够飞行至多10尺。若你在回合结束时位于空中，而且你并不具有飞行速度，则会坠落。
  • 沼泽 Swamp (植物) 你的魔法抽取有毒的沼泽气体烟熏你的敌人。受影响的敌人进行基础强韧豁免，失败则承受@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续毒素伤害}，数值等同于法术环级的一半（最低1点伤害）。
  • 地底 Underground (土) 洞穴深处的无尽黑暗向你的感官揭示出了它的秘密。在1轮内，你获得黑暗视觉以及15尺范围的模糊震颤感知。

特殊 直至选取另外两个地卜师变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.U1I87PGViGpGaP7D]{转换同调 Attunement Shift} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}

频率 每10分钟一次

需求 你的上个动作是施放具有气、寒冷、土、火焰、植物或水特征的法术

你所施放的法术的魔力涌入体内，凌驾于你周遭的土地之上。你调整自身的地形同调，变为与你刚刚施放的那个法术的特征相符的一种地形。当你进一步施放具有相同描述符的法术时，你会继续获得当前地形同调的效果，而非使用你当前身处地形的同调效果。举例说明，若你施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{绊足术 Tanglefoot}，你的地形同调根据自身选择切换为森林或沼泽，当你施放其他植物法术时该地形同调就会应用至你的身上。

你的地形同调在使用转换同调后会持续1分钟，之后便会恢复至你当前身处的地形。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pfF5UzT1MLW3KwHd]{分享同调 Shared Attunement} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}

当你将要从地形同调中获得好处时，你能够将其授予30尺内的1名盟友以取代你自己。若地形同调影响的是敌人而非给你带来好处的话，这么做就不会产生效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O0POcPD2aELYTcIK]{险地架势 Rough Terrain Stance} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}, 自然熟练度达到专家

需求 你在此回合获得了地形同调带来的好处

你进入了一种让自身周遭难以行动的架势。与你相邻的每个方格都变为困难地形，此困难地形与你获得地形同调相符（极地地形内为雾凇，森林地形内为迅速生长的灌木丛，以此类推）。你自身忽略这个困难地形。

当你移动进入不同类别的地形时，此架势便会结束。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bkX8v744C62W8hol]{调律阔步 Attuned Stride} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}, 自然熟练度达到专家

你能够在自身同调的地形中自由行动。当你获得地形同调带来的好处时，你就会变得忽略此类地形中相应的困难地形，持续至你的下个回合结束为止。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HlqAdfxmcd9gdgHa]{借力于地 Draw From the Land} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}, 自然熟练度达到专家

需求 你在该回合内获得地形同调的好处，且它符合你当前身处的地形

你从周遭的地形中汲取力量。你获得临时生命值，数值等同于你的等级。这持续1轮。若在此回合内，你先前获得的是平原地形同调效果，则将两者提供的临时生命值相加。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Gu8IAYxwNdQM603P]{阅读地相 Read the Land} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}, 自然熟练度达到大师

你懂得如何与大地沟通来了解信息。你学会@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.l4LFwY7iuzX6sDXr]{问道自然 Commune with Nature}仪式（若你还未懂得该仪式的话）。你能以一小时的施放时间来执行此仪式，以取代原本的一日，而且不需要次要施法者便能执行仪式。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TNRB8IY6Wtk9BoMp]{地形庇护 Terrain Shield} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}, 自然熟练度达到大师

频率 每10分钟一次

触发 一次打击即将伤害到你

需求 你最近的回合开始时便获得了地形同调的好处，且该地形同调与你当前身处的地形相符

你与大地是如此地协调，以至于它要从可能致命的猛击中以看似巧合的形式保护你。举例说明：周边的树上突然有一根树枝掉落下来化解了挥舞着的长剑的冲击力，或者突然出现的电流扰乱了敌人的攻击。你在对抗触发攻击时，获得对抗物理伤害的抗力，数值等同于你的等级的2倍。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SA8rnheHFtjkATrJ]{地形偏移 Shifting Terrain} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.O0POcPD2aELYTcIK]{险地架势 Rough Terrain Stance}, 自然熟练度达到大师

需求 你的地形同调与你当前身处的地形相符，而且你当前处于险地架势中

你用拳头猛击地面或者旋转手臂，这使得你周遭的地形发生了变化和波动，而这很可能让他人失去平衡。对于身处你的险地架势造成的困难地形区域内的每名生物，都必须尝试一次反射豁免检定对抗你的法术DC，并造成后述效果。

当你使用地形偏移动作后，便在[[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用它。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}，持续1轮。

失败 该生物陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}，持续1轮。

大失败 该生物陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}，持续1轮，并且还会@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gqISxjbTtZSYndZ4]{瞬时同调 Quickened Attunement} 专长 16

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{地卜师入门 Geomancer Dedication}, 自然熟练度达到传奇

频率 每天一次

需求 你的上一个动作是转换同调

若你的下个动作是施放法术，且该法术会赋予你地形同调的奖励，则将该次施法所使用的动作减少一个（最低是一个动作）。

特殊 你无法在同一轮内使用瞬时同调和@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z2ptq23nNBOeEI7H]{快速施法 Quickened Casting}。

Ghost.name: Ghost
Ghost.description:
Ghost

Your ties to the living world cling to you in death, your unfinished business reducing you to a spirit. Your soul carries on, but your body is gone. Your mind, too, may have changed: though death can impact thoughts and desires in all sorts of ways, most ghosts experience stronger, more volatile emotions and are frequently overcome by their past ties. A need to reconcile the past overwhelms other needs. Motivations can change over time but are always strong. Pragmatism, compassion, and foresight fall before a ghost's fundamental desires.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.52nzskpmUt9AjUf8]{Ghost Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 You died and returned as a ghost.

You have risen as a shell of your former self, a spirit of mist and anguish. You gain the ghost, spirit, and undead traits, and the @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.SAbzItAI4uwbdnQk]{Basic Undead Benefits}. Your undead craving is to settle your unfinished business. You also gain the incorporeal trait, as described on page 218, except you can't pass through solid objects unless you select the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7fyWKASX6uNByJF5]{Pass Through} feat. Being a ghost has the following major effects.

Floating You can float but are still tethered to the ground. Replace your land Speed with an equal fly Speed. You can't rise more than a few inches above the ground when you Fly. This means you can move above many types of difficult or hazardous terrain without moving slowly or being damaged, even though you can't fly without limit. You can Leap, High Jump, Long Jump, and take similar actions, and use your fly Speed for any calculations that would normally require your land Speed.

Items You can transmute physical items to make them part of your incorporeal form. This requires spending 10 minutes with the items within reach, during which you transform the items into part of your form; you can return items you already have incorporated to a corporeal state at the same time. The items retain all their runes and other abilities, need to be invested normally if they have the invested trait, and need to be worn, held, or stowed appropriately. Once you've incorporated the items, you and other incorporeal creatures can use them normally—you can Interact with them, Release them, and so on. Your incorporated weapons gain the benefits of the ghost touch property rune, allowing you to use them normally against both corporeal and incorporeal creatures. Incorporated items become corporeal again only if you transmute them back or are destroyed, in which case, they drop to the ground under you.

Attacks Your unarmed attacks become magical and deal negative damage instead of their normal type.

Strength Unlike most incorporeal creatures, your Strength modifier is not -5; you keep the same Strength score you had before you became a ghost, though you can only attempt Strength-based skill checks—typically Athletics checks—against other incorporeal creatures, as normal for an incorporeal creature. Against incorporeal creatures, use your Strength normally to determine the results of Athletics checks, Strikes with melee weapons, and any other checks or damage rolls dependent on Strength.

Ties that Bind When you become a ghost, work with your GM to choose a bound site and unfinished business, both of which matter for your character's story, as well as some ghost archetype feats. Your bound site tethers you to the physical world and is typically either a location important to you in life or the place where you died. Unfinished business keeps you from passing to the afterlife. If someone resolves your unfinished business, you decide whether to accept the change and pass on, or to fight it. If you pass on, you get a few minutes to say your goodbyes, and then move into the River of Souls and the afterlife. Your character ceases to be. If you fight the change, you remain, though you and the GM might determine a new unfinished business. If you are physically destroyed, you cease your existence as a ghost but still might not be able to pass on to the afterlife if your unfinished business is incomplete. In this liminal state, you might come across strange energies and become another sort of creature, or anchor to a summoner and become an eidolon.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xUaEpnfd1FMGNG1z]{Frightful Moan} 专长 4

先决条件 Ghost Dedication

Frequency Once per 10 minutes

You lament your fate, forcing each living creature in a 30-foot emanation to attempt a Will save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

成功 The creature is unaffected and temporarily immune to Frightful Moans for 1 minute.

Failure The creature is frightened 1.

Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pwM4RGwCTLiVSic0]{Ghostly Resistance} 专长 4

先决条件 Ghost Dedication

Your ghostly form becomes innately weaker but also gains resistance to many forms of damage. Your maximum HP is reduced by your level. You gain resistance 1 to all damage except for force, positive, and any damage done by a weapon with the ghost touch rune (or any other source that acts like a ghost touch rune). This resistance increases to 2 if the source is non-magical. At 10th level, the resistance increases to 2, or 4 if the source is non-magical. At 16th level, the resistance increases to 3, or 5 if the source is non-magical.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Ozm0xy2lrOq6GiWU]{Ghostly Grasp} 专长 6

先决条件 Ghost Dedication

Your control over your ghostly form grows. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.ancestryfeatures.YGk41WV42aTM7CQV]{Advanced Undead Benefits} and can interact with physical objects, with limits. You can attempt Strength-based skill checks against physical creatures and objects. You can Interact with physical objects, but the action has no effect unless you succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:20] or @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Interact with an Object] check.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zJXsGF61lH0WHw5v]{Ghost Flight} 专长 8

先决条件 Ghost Dedication

Frequency Once per day

You can suppress your tether to the ground, overcoming your resistance to fly free. For 10 minutes, your fly Speed doesn't restrict you to only a few inches off the ground, allowing you to travel to any height you choose.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7fyWKASX6uNByJF5]{Pass Through} 专长 10

先决条件 master in Acrobatics, Ghost Dedication

Frequency Once per 10 minutes

Filtering your form through the substance of an object, you can pass through walls, doors, and more. You Fly up to your Speed. During this movement, you can try to move through one object. Attempt an Acrobatics check as you try to enter its space. The DC is typically 30 to move through a wall of up to 5 feet, 15 for an ordinary door, and 10 for thinner structures like windows; the GM might set the DC higher for especially dense materials like adamantine or lead, or for barriers that are magically reinforced. You can't Pass Through an obstacle made of magical force, such as a wall of force.

成功 You move through the object, treating the square within it as difficult terrain. If you end your turn inside an object, you can move out of it only if you Pass Through again or use some other means of moving through a solid object. As normal for being incorporeal, starting your turn inside an object makes you slowed 1 for that turn.

Failure Your movement ends, and you trigger reactions as if you moved out of the square you started in.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AtidbY3lU49taaUR]{Rejuvenation} 专长 12

先决条件 Ghost Dedication

The call of your unfinished business recreates you after destruction. When you're destroyed, you reform after 2d4 days within your bound site, fully healed. If your unfinished business is resolved while you're waiting, you pass on immediately unless you and the GM determine you have new unfinished business.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LhqWrgeBH2sdRxND]{Unlimited Ghost Flight} 专长 14

先决条件 Ghost Flight

You put your connection to the material world farther behind you. Your fly Speed no longer restricts the height you can fly. When you use Ghost Flight, instead of its normal effect, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed for 10 minutes.

Ghost Eater.name: 噬魂师 Ghost Eater
Ghost Eater.description:
噬魂师 Ghost Eater

民那塔的战士经常与出没于塔乌马塔破碎土地的失落魂魄战斗。这些民那塔战士，在邦木岛附近也被称作噬魂师，他们遍历民那塔诸岛，为驱魔人和牧师提供协力。当处于这种协作时，噬魂师的主要职责是消灭魂魄，给他们的神职同伴时间来了解灵魂并最终让他们安息。

角色可以在从义洛里神庙找回@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.gswNvLPc2D0n0AOB]{赤凰项链 Phoenix Necklace}后，在依格妲尼处获得选取该变体的许可。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.r1um0cn7MRIMLqcq]{噬魂师入门 Ghost Eater Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 神秘或宗教熟练度达到受训

你受训成为一名噬魂师，一种专门消灭魂魄的猎人。你知道如何使用你的精神之力来伤害魂魄。你的武器和非武装打击获得魔法特征。针对无实体生物，还将获得幽冥符文效果。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从该变体中获得了其他两个专长。
